headline: The Bull Case For Abbott Laboratories (ABT) Could Change Following Dividend Hike And New AFib Device Approval
summary: In recent weeks, Abbott Laboratories raised its quarterly dividend for the 52nd consecutive year and secured CE Mark approval in Europe for its TactiFlex Duo ablation catheter to treat atrial fibrillation, while investors awaited its 22 January 2026 earnings report focused on diagnostics and medical devices performance. These developments highlight how Abbott is pairing a long-standing, income-focused capital return policy with ongoing innovation in higher-value cardiac care technologies,...

headline: Abbott receives CE Mark for the TactiFlex™ Duo Ablation Catheter to treat patients with abnormal heart rhythms
summary: Abbott (NYSE: ABT) today announced it has received CE Mark in Europe for the TactiFlex™ Duo Ablation Catheter, Sensor Enabled™ to treat patients with atrial fibrillation (AFib). Following the new approval, the first successful commercial cases using TactiFlex Duo in the European Union were completed this week.
